socha.name: Soliton Charger
socha.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Soliton Charger on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

axc.name: Axion Computer
axc.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Axion Computer on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

cru.name: Ancient Cruiser
cru.description: Place 1 Cruiser from your Supply on this Sector Hex.

iod.name: Ion Disruptor
iod.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Ion Disruptor on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

cod.name: Conformal Drive
cod.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Conformal Drive on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

jud.name: Jump Drive
jud.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Jump Drive on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action. This Ship may Jump to any neighbouring Sector once per Movement Activation. Counts as 1 Drive.

nod.name: Nonlinear Drive
nod.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Nonlinear Drive on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

shh.name: Shard Hull
shh.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Shard Hull on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

iot.name: Ion Turret
iot.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Ion Turret on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

anm.name: Antimatter Missile
anm.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Anitmatter Missile on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

iom.name: Ion Missile
iom.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Ion Missile on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

som.name: Soliton Missile
som.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Soliton Missile on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

mix.name: Money and Wild Gain
mix.description: Gain 3 Money and 3 identical Resources of your choice.

mon.name: Monolith
mon.description: Place 1 Monolith from your Supply on this Sector Hex.

orb.name: Orbital
orb.description: Place 1 Orbital from your Supply on this Sector Hex, and gain 2 Materials.

art.name: Artifact Codex
art.description: Gain 1 VP for each Artifact on Sector Hexes you Control.

rep.name: Ancient Might
rep.description: Gain 1 VP for every 3 Points of Reputation you’ve gained.

ricon.name: Rift Conductor
ricon.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Rift Conductor on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

fls.name: Flux Shield
fls.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Flux Shield on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

ins.name: Inversion Shield
ins.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Inversion Shield on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

mos.name: Morph Shield
mos.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Morph Shield on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action. Gives a -1 Shield. Repairs 1 Damage Cube from each of the Ships it is equipped to at the end of each Engagement Round.

hyg.name: Hypergrid Source
hyg.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Hypergrid Source on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

mus.name: Muon Source
mus.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Muon Source outside of 1 of your Ship Blueprints.

tec.name: Tech Gain
tec.description: Take 1 regular Tech Tile, with the lowest printed cost you don’t already have from the Tech Tray. Place it for free.

plt.name: Plasma Turret
plt.description: Place the Ancient Ship Part Plasma Turret on any of your Ship Blueprints, following the normal rules for placing Ship Parts. Or, keep them next to your Species Board, and place with a future Upgrade Action.

wap.name: Warp Portal
wap.description: Place this Ancient Warp Portal on this Sector Hex. It connects to all other Warp Portals, and is worth 2 VP if Controlled.
